column2: Amazon asks customers to pick from TV pilots for show development LOS ANGELES
column3: Feb 6 Amazon.com Inc  released its second batch of TV pilots on Thursday and asked for customer feedback to help determine which of the 10 shows to develop into series for its video streaming service.

column2: Target vendor says hackers breached data link used for billing WEDNESDAY
column3: Feb 6 The Target Corp hackers managed to break into its payments network by first breaching a "data connection" between the U.S. retailer and its heating and ventilation systems contractor
column4: a representative for the contractor said on Thursday.

column2: Tesoro replacing older crude railcars in its fleet -CEO HOUSTON
column3: Feb 6 Tesoro Corp is replacing older railcars in its crude-by-rail fleet with ones that have the latest safety design
column4: Chief Executive Officer Greg Goff told analysts on Thursday.

column2: CORRECTED-New York bank regulator stops Ocwen-Wells Fargo dealUPDATE 1-New York bank regulator stops Ocwen-Wells Fargo deal Feb 6 New York's principal bank regulator has indefinitely halted Ocwen Financial Corp's purchase of the right to collect payments on a portfolio of mortgages from Wells Fargo & Co
